updateAvailable.title: Update Available
updateAvailable.subtitle: A new version is ready
updateAvailable.upgradeCommand: git checkout main && git pull && npm install
updateAvailable.upgradeInstructions: Run this command in your Claude Code UI directory to update to the latest version.

empty.runClaude: Run Claude CLI in a project directory to get started

loading.fetchingProjects: Fetching your Claude projects and sessions

main.selectProjectDescription: Select a project from the sidebar to start coding with Claude. Each project contains your chat sessions and file history.
main.mobileTip: Tap the menu button above to access projects
main.desktopTip: Create a new project by clicking the folder icon in the sidebar

microphone.notSupported: Microphone not supported. Please use HTTPS or a modern browser.
microphone.requiresHttps: Microphone requires HTTPS. Please use a secure connection.
microphone.accessNotAvailable: Microphone access not available. Please use HTTPS or a supported browser.
microphone.accessDenied: Microphone access denied. Please allow microphone permissions.
microphone.notFound: No microphone found. Please check your audio devices.
microphone.notSupportedByBrowser: Microphone not supported by this browser.
microphone.inUse: Microphone is being used by another application.

errors.failedToDeleteSession: Failed to delete session. Please try again.
errors.errorDeletingSession: Error deleting session. Please try again.
errors.failedToDeleteProject: Failed to delete project. Please try again.
errors.errorDeletingProject: Error deleting project. Please try again.
errors.failedToCreateProject: Failed to create project. Please try again.
errors.errorCreatingProject: Error creating project. Please try again.

confirmations.deleteSession: Are you sure you want to delete this session? This action cannot be undone.
confirmations.deleteEmptyProject: Are you sure you want to delete this empty project? This action cannot be undone.
